titles.title: USCP Empowerment Act of 2025
USCP Empowerment Act of 2025
To authorize the United States Capitol Police to take action with respect to threats from unmanned aircraft systems, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committees on Transportation and Infrastructure, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
